properties.description: This is a wrapper pipeline for creating extracts

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_logÂ table.

activities.name: EP-Snowflake_Extraction
activities.description:
This activity executes the EP-snowflakeExtraction pipeline.
Parameters are passed from the output of enggcontainer_metadata activity.

activities.name: EP-Snowflake_Extraction Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of Ep-snowflakeExtraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: EP-Snowflake_Extraction Failed
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-Snowflake_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
ENGG.parent_id
,ENGG.dependent_id
,ENGG.application_name
,ENGG.dataset_name
,ENGG.dataset_group
,ENGG.adf_trigger_name
,ENGG.snowflake_role
,ENGG.warehouse_size
,ENGG.snowflake_database
,ENGG.snowflake_schema
,ENGG.base_table_name
,ENGG.snowflake_stage_name
,ENGG.snowflake_file_format
,ENGG.copy_options
,ENGG.container_name
,ENGG.extract_blob_location
,ENGG.extract_archival_blob_name
,REPLACE(ENGG.extract_file_name,'<yyyy>',CAST(YEAR(DATEADD(MONTH,-1,(CAST(Current_TimeStamp AS DATE)))) AS VARCHAR)) as extract_file_name
,ENGG.server_name
,ENGG.sftp_path
,ENGG.sftp_copy_ind
,ENGG.created_user_name
,ENGG.created_timestamp
,ENGG.updated_username
,ENGG.updated_timestamp
,ENGG.active_ind
,Orchec.* from 
(select * from khc_enggextract_metadata 
where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}' 
and adf_trigger_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.adf_trigger_name}' and active_ind = 'y' ) ENGG
CROSS JOIN 
(select distinct parameter_json
from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}'
and SUBSTRING(concat('/',dbt_trigger_name), LEN(concat('/',dbt_trigger_name)) - CHARINDEX('/',REVERSE(concat('/',dbt_trigger_name))) + 2, LEN(concat('/',dbt_trigger_name))) = '@{pipeline().parameters.adf_trigger_name}' and active_ind = 'y') Orchec

activities.name: LU Metadata Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  LU-MetaData activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: LU Metadata Failed
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Pipeline_Complete_Status_Failed
activities.description: CPNL Extract pipeline Failed

activities.name: EP-BLOB_TO_SFTP Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: EP-BLOB_TO_SFTP Failed
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: PL_KHCDE_MBO_GOALZ_BLOB_SFTP
activities.description: Trade Summary - BLOB to SFTP

activities.name: FE_Rename_extract
activities.description: This activity loops on all the records that needs to be unloaded from snowflake.

activities.name: Check Year End condition
activities.description: To check if it is boundary condition during year end extraction

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_Delete_blob
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of Delete_Blob.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_Delete_Blob
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of Delete_Blob

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_CP_Rename_Blob_ADLS
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of  CP_Rename_Blob_ADLS in IF_outbound_folder_exists table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_CP_Rename_Blob_ADLS
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of CP_Rename_Blob_ADLS activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_Check Year End condition
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Check Year End condition.

activities.name: SP-Failure_Check Year End condition
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Check Year End condition activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: LU_RENAME_EXTRACT_METADATA
activities.description: This activity extracts information of tables which needs to be unloaded from snowflake from metadata tabel - khc_enggextract_metadata.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select application_name,
dataset_name,
dataset_group,
adf_trigger_name,
container_name,
extract_blob_location,
extract_archival_blob_name,
REPLACE(extract_file_name,'<yyyy>',CAST(YEAR(CAST(Current_TimeStamp AS DATE)) AS VARCHAR)) as extract_file_name,
server_name,
sftp_path,sftp_copy_ind,active_ind from dbo.khc_enggextract_metadata where application_name  ='@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}' and 
dataset_group='@{activity('LU-Metadata').output.value[0].dataset_group}' and sftp_copy_ind='y' and active_ind='y' and server_name in ('LS_Sftp_Globalscape','LS_FS_BLYFORD','LS_SFTP_HIGH_RADIUS','LS_Sftp_AU_IRI','LS_SFTP_SFDC_DOWNSTREAM_INTEGRATION','LS_FS_FOODSERVICE_US_VIA','LS_AZ_KHC_DATASHARE_STRGV2','LS_AZ_KHC_O9_EXTERNALSHARE_STRGV2','LS_FS_ORACLE_APPS_112','LS_AZ_KHC_EXTERNALSHARE_STRGV2','LS_SFTP_IBM_GPS_IHOST')

activities.name: LU_RENAME_EXTRACT_METADATA Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  LU-MetaData activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: LU_RENAME_EXTRACT_METADATA Failed
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-FE_Rename_extract
activities.description: This activity logs success of  FE_extract activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_FE_Rename_extract
activities.description: This activity logs failure of FE_extract activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: FE_Delete_Extract_Blob
activities.description: This activity loops on all the records that needs to be unloaded from snowflake.

activities.name: SP-Success_Delete_Blob_Extract
activities.description: This activity logs success of Delete_Blob.

activities.name: SP-Failure_Delete_Blob_Extract

activities.name: Pipeline_Complete_Status_Success
activities.description: CPNL Extract pipeline successful

activities.name: SP-Failure_FE_Delete_Extract_Blob

activities.name: SP-FE_Delete_Extract_Blob_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  FE_extract activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.
